title: mentally friendly: fix
intro:
Coffee runs from Mentally Friendly's local haunt (Bean Haus in Redfern) is a mandatory daily ritual. When clients arrive in the double digits for workshops, keeping track of coffee orders can be pretty exhausting.

A slow day in the office had me conceptualising an app idea called 'Fix' - designed to take orders: large or small, niche or simple.

descriptionTexts.descriptionText: The idea's simple: a MF-er places an order for [x] number of people in an area / room in the office. Each beverage is added to the cart - tailored to fit even the most exclusive of orders. This order is sent straight to our local coffee place of choice. Caffeine fix without the hassle.
